pages.discalimer: Bet Bliss Casino-Hotel | Disclaimer Bet Bliss Home Exclusive luxury Facilities Events Casino The pursuit of excellence +44-333-777-3915 Disclaimer Responsible Gaming Bet Bliss is committed to promoting responsible gaming. We encourage our users to gamble responsibly and to seek help if they have a gambling problem. Our website provides information and resources for responsible gaming, including links to organizations that offer help and support for problem gambling. By using our website or any of our services, you acknowledge that you are aware of the risks associated with gambling and that you are responsible for your own gambling behavior. Geographic Restrictions The Bet Bliss website and services are intended for use by individuals located in jurisdictions where online gaming and hotel reservations are legal. We do not represent or warrant that our website or services are appropriate or available for use in all jurisdictions. If you choose to access our website or services from a jurisdiction where such activity is illegal, you do so at your own risk, and you are responsible for complying with all applicable laws and regulations. No Professional Advice The information provided on the Bet Bliss website is for general informational purposes only and should not be construed as professional advice. We do not provide legal, financial, medical, or any other type of professional advice. If you require professional advice, you should consult with a licensed professional in the relevant field. Assignment Bet Bliss may assign or transfer this Disclaimer or any of our policies, in whole or in part, at any time without notice. You may not assign or transfer your rights or obligations under this Disclaimer or any of our policies without our prior written consent. Governing Language This Disclaimer and any of our policies are written in the English language. Any translated versions of this Disclaimer or any of our policies are provided for convenience only and are not legally binding. In the event of any conflict between the English language version and any translated version, the English language version shall prevail. Survival The provisions of this Disclaimer and any of our policies that by their nature should survive termination shall survive any termination of this Disclaimer or any of our policies. Changes to Disclaimer Bet Bliss reserves the right to modify or amend this Disclaimer at any time without notice. Any changes to this Disclaimer will be effective immediately upon posting on our website. Your continued use of our website or any of our services after any changes to this Disclaimer are posted will be considered acceptance of those changes. Contact Information If you have any questions or concerns about this Disclaimer or any of our policies, please contact us at betbliss@gmail.com. Dispute Resolution Any dispute or claim arising out of or in connection with this Disclaimer or any of our policies shall be resolved through binding arbitration in accordance with the commercial arbitration rules of the American Arbitration Association. The arbitration shall be conducted in Las Vegas, Nevada, and the parties agree to submit to the personal jurisdiction of the state and federal courts located in Las Vegas, Nevada, for the purpose of enforcing any arbitration award. By using the Bet Bliss website, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to be bound by this Disclaimer and all of our policies. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our website or any of our services. Thank you for choosing Bet Bliss. pages.privacy-policy: Bet Bliss Casino-Hotel | Privacy Policy Bet Bliss Home Exclusive luxury Facilities Events Casino The pursuit of excellence +44-333-777-3915 Privacy Policy Data Retention We retain your information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. We consider various factors when determining the appropriate retention period, including the type of information, the purpose for which it was collected, and our legal obligations. Third-Party Links and Services Our website may contain links to third-party websites, services, or applications that are not owned or controlled by Bet Bliss. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these third parties, and we encourage you to review their privacy policies before providing any information to them. Your Great Britain Privacy Rights If you are a Great Britain resident, you have specific rights under the Great Britain Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA). These rights include the right to request access to your personal information, the right to request deletion of your personal information, and the right to opt out of the sale of your personal information. To exercise your rights under the CCPA, please contact us at betbliss@gmail.com. Cross-Border Data Transfers Bet Bliss is based in the United States, and we may transfer, process, and store your information in countries other than your country of residence. These countries may have data protection laws that are different from the laws of your country. By using our services, you consent to the transfer of your information to the United States and other countries where we operate. Data Protection Officer Bet Bliss has appointed a Data Protection Officer (DPO) to oversee our data protection strategies and ensure compliance with data protection regulations. If you have any questions or concerns about our data protection practices, you can contact our DPO at betbliss@gmail.com. Dispute Resolution If you have a complaint or dispute regarding our Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at betbliss@gmail.com. We will investigate your complaint and attempt to resolve the issue in a timely and satisfactory manner. If we are unable to resolve your complaint, you may have the right to file a complaint with your local data protection authority. Updates to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. If we make material changes to this Privacy Policy, we will notify you by email or through a notice on our website prior to the effective date of the changes. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any updates or changes. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at betbliss@gmail.com. By using our services, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy. Thank you for choosing Bet Bliss for your gaming and hospitality needs. We look forward to providing you with an exceptional experience.
